scripts.build: echo "Compiling TypeScript..." && tsc && echo "Building..." && vite build
scripts.types: echo "Create .d.ts file in dist ..." && npx -p typescript tsc dist/*.js --declaration --allowJs --emitDeclarationOnly --outDir dist
scripts.all: npm run delete-dist && npm run build && npm run types && echo "Done!!!"
scripts.release-patch: echo "Increment version patch..." && npm version patch && npm run push && npm run release
scripts.release-minor: echo "Increment version minor..." && npm version minor && npm run push && npm run release
scripts.release-major: echo "Increment version major..." && npm version major && npm run push && npm run release
